p.s: Brexit is clearly a lose-lose situation for both, that is what Michel Barnier was saying in his speech at the European American Chamber of Commerce.
In the following I will comment on this assumption.
In my point of view he is absolutely right!
The UK officiellyofficially left the trading bloc - its nearest and biggest trading partner - on 31 January 2020.

Nevertheless, the open market system is the best trading system in the world.
Subsequently, we can say the UK lost trading partners and lots of profit.
So, as Michel Barnier said, there is definitely a lose.
Some parts of the UK, for example Northern Ireland, have to continue to follow many rules in order to avoid a hardening of its border with Republic of Ireland.
